name: @incodelang/compiler
description: The new compiler for the InCode Programming Language

scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run bundle && npm run buildDocs
scripts.bundle: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run bundle:esm && npm run bundle:umd && npm run minify:esm && npm run minify:umd
scripts.bundle:no-clean: npm run build && npm run bundle:esm && npm run bundle:umd && npm run minify:esm && npm run minify:umd
scripts.bundle:umd: rollup dist/index.js --file bundles/incode.compiler.umd.js --format umd --name InCode -c rollup.config.js
scripts.clean: del-cli --force dist && del-cli --force docs && del-cli --force bundles

author: The InCode Developers
